name: market for maintenance, polymer electrolyte membrane fuel cell, 2kW electrical | maintenance, polymer electrolyte membrane fuel cell, 2kW electrical | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/714/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'maintenance, polymer electrolyte membrane fuel cell, 2kW electrical', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is delivering the service of maintenance for a polymer electrolyte membrane (PEM) fuel cell with 2 kW electrical output.  Maintenance is carried out every year or 5,300 h while every fourth year (21,000 h) reformer catalyst stack replacement and every sixth year (32,000 h) stack replacement is carried out. The service includes materials and transport used for the maintenance of the PEM fuel cell unit.

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
